title: Kuru extends!
content: Antti @anhelkuru Kuru stays! The versatile Finnish veteran who played a crucial part in our #ECL24Spring Elite campaign will continue to wear the virtual TBJ jersey

title: Sandro Wüller signs for TBJ!
content: Sandro @I-THE_EAGLE-I Wüller will round up our roster for #NHL25 as the 28-year-old Hessian joins us from @hclugano Esports ♠️

title: Kostiii to TBJ!
content: We welcome Santeri @Kkostiiii1 Kostiainen! The 31-year-old Goalie joins us after spending the last two ECL Elite Seasons at @VesaPompa and will strengthen us between the pipes as Simeon @Simbanho Vorselman will head into military service this autumn ♠️

title: German Hedman aka xPsykoSkills joins!
content: With the #NHL25 Trailer around the corner we have some big news for the upcoming season ♠️We welcome Niklas @xPsykoSkills Schmitz! The 27-year-old right defenseman joins us from our German competitor @Deadly_Phantoms for the upcoming #ECL25Winter Elite and #GCL12 campaign 🤩

title: The captain celebrates his birthday
content: Happy Birthday to our Captain and Austrian Alumni Defenseman Max @Merximerlity Tonitz aka Toneee9 🎉🥳🍾🎊

title: Hearthbreaking loss in Game 7
content: Our season ends in Game 7 of the #ECL24Spring Elite Quarterfinals against seed #1 @ValokuitunenNHL. We put in everything we had but fell short in the deciding game. What a season, what an effort. See you in #NHL25 ♠️🆚 @ValokuitunenNHL 1:4, 3:1, 0:1, 2:1 & 1:3 @SportsGamerGG

title: Series continues tonight, current score 1-1
content: Night 2 in the #ECL24Spring Elite Quarterfinals! Current score is 1-1 ♠️Make sure to tune in 👇
